original_text: And they came thither into the midst of the house, as though they would have fetched wheat; and they smote him under the fifth rib: and Rechab and Baanah his brother escaped.
korean_text: 레갑과 그의 형제 바아나가 밀을 가지러 온 체하고 집 가운데로 들어가서 그의 배를 찌르고 도망하였더라

sentences.original_text: And they came thither into the midst of the house,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그곳으로 와서 집 중앙으로 들어갔는데

sentences.original_text: as though they would have fetched wheat;
and they smote him under the fifth rib:
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 다섯 번째 갈빗대 아래를 쳤고

sentences.original_text: and Rechab and Baanah his brother escaped.
